references.prompt: Looking up at a burgundy tree trunk from ground level, bark smooth and slightly warm-toned. Vignette compositions fading gently to white.

Generate a character portrait headshot (shoulders up) against a plain neutral background.

Physical appearance: 5'7", average build with some muscle from cargo work, light brown skin, black hair (kept short for practicality, usually messy), dark brown eyes, oval face with a slightly upturned nose. Appears early-to-mid 20s. Hands have calluses from handling freight. Usually wears standard-issue cargo crew jumpsuit in navy blue with company patches.

Clothing and expression: A woman in her early-to-mid 20s with light brown skin and an oval face. Black hair kept short and practical, currently messy and slightly tousled. Dark brown eyes with an alert, curious quality. Slightly upturned nose, giving her face a friendly openness. Neutral, relaxed expression with a hint of attentiveness. Navy blue cargo jumpsuit with a sturdy utilitarian collar, faded corporate patches visible on both shoulders, zipper pulled up to mid-chest.

Framing: Head and shoulders, centered, looking slightly to the right.
Background: Plain, neutral gradient - do not include any environment or setting.

Display the name "Kira Voss" as text at the bottom of the image.
